SEARCH
Package org.application.teachers

Interface ITeachersService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TeachersService
public interface ITeachersService
Represents a service interface for managing Teacher entities. This interface defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to teacher service.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • addTeacher

      Teacher addTeacher(String name, Teacher.Type type) throws TeacherAdditionException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Teacher with the given name and type.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new Teacher.
      type - The type of the new Teacher.
      Returns:
      The newly created Teacher.
      Throws:
      TeacherAdditionException - If the Teacher could not be added.
      ValidationException - If the provided name or type are invalid.

    • deleteTeacher

      boolean deleteTeacher(int teacherId) throws TeacherNotFoundException, TeacherDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes a Teacher with the given id.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The id of the Teacher to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Teacher was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the Teacher with the given id was not found.
      TeacherDeletionFailed - If the Teacher could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • deleteTeachers

      boolean deleteTeachers(String name) throws TeacherDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes a Teacher with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Teacher to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Teacher was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      TeacherDeletionFailed - If the Teacher could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided name is invalid.

    • deleteAll

      boolean deleteAll() throws TeacherDeletionFailed
      Deletes all Teacher entities.
      Returns:
      True if all Teacher entities were deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      TeacherDeletionFailed - If the Teacher entities could not be deleted.

    • getTeacherById

      Teacher getTeacherById(int teacherId) throws TeacherNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Retrieves a Teacher by its ID.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The id of the Teacher to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Teacher with the given id.
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the Teacher with the given id was not found.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • getTeachers

      List<Teacher> getTeachers()
      Retrieves all Teacher entities.
      Returns:
      A list of all Teacher entities.
